moves.1. e4: Hello faithful fans of hiredgun112's growing chess prowness.This is my biggest win on gameknot highest rated player i have defeated so far,so higher rated players get ready I AM COMING FOR YOU!So here we go.He opens with e4.
moves.2. Nf3: Nf3 for him.I might have went Nc3
moves.3... Bg4: This is a habit move i make.You think good or bad?
moves.4... Bh5: Don't like this bad habit move i usually  lose bishop
moves.5... Nc6: Looking back i should have went Nf6 here
moves.6. d3 Nf6 7. Bg5: Now Nf6 and Qd8 is pinned
moves.8. g4: Now Bh5,Nf6 and f7 in danger
moves.9... f6: putting a little pawn pressure on
moves.11. Nxd4: But i gain piece back on next move
moves.11... exd4 12. Nd5: I am really threatened not much development in place
moves.13. Nf4: unsure of reason for this move
moves.14... O-O-O: instead of castling i should have g5xBh4
moves.15... Qe7 16. Bxg5: Should have took Bh4 when i could
moves.16... Ng8: retreating was thinking at this point i was going to lose
moves.17. Nxg8: give away other N and Qe7 threatened by Bg5
moves.18. Qf3 Qa5+: Despartion trying to figure out what to do
moves.19. Kd1 Bh6: Do you see Bh6 and Qa5 attack combo?
moves.20. Qg4+: Opponent trying to set me up for Q and B attack
moves.21. Be6: Setting me up for kill with Be6,Qg4 and Ng8 but sometimes the best laid plans for the kill or just not enough
moves.21... Qd2#: I drop the hammer one more "kill".I was losing this game but i came back.I hope this has been informative.Postive input appreciated,negative tolerated.GOOD CHESS
